officialDesc: Since its creation in 1972, Rachel Carson College (founded as College Eight) has been a crucial component of the university's world renowned Environmental, Ecological and Sustainability programs and initiatives. Our graduates include some of the nation's top environmental professionals and practitioners.With green issues assuming growing importance to our world, Rachel Carson College  has embarked upon an ambitious curricular initiative to nurture student talents, skills and knowledge.
studentDesc: We don't really know what goes on in RCC. It's like a cult. Outsiders not allowed. Although their dining hall is nice and new so thats cool.
